remarks: Indirect strong induction on the upper integers.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Aug-2015.)
statement:
uzindi.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
uzindi.b $e |- ( ph -> T e. ( ZZ>= ` L ) ) $.
uzindi.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ R e. ( L ... T ) /\ A. y ( S e. ( L ..^ R ) -> ch ) ) -> ps ) $.
uzindi.d $e |- ( x = y -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
uzindi.e $e |- ( x = A -> ( ps <-> th ) ) $.
uzindi.f $e |- ( x = y -> R = S ) $.
uzindi.g $e |- ( x = A -> R = T ) $.
uzindi $p |- ( ph -> th ) $.
$d A x $.
$d L x y $.
$d R y $.
$d S x $.
$d T x y $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph x y $.
$d ps y $.
$d th x $.
